metadataAttributes.Title: Introduction to Finance and Accounting Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn the basics of finance and accounting. Build a foundation of core business skills in finance and accounting
metadataAttributes.Skills: Corporate Finance, Financial Accounting, Financial Statement, Accounting, Decision-Making, Discounted Cash Flow, Cash Flow Analysis, Balance Sheet, Generally Accepted Accounting Principles, Accounting Terminology,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Jessica Wachter ,Michael R Roberts ,Brian J Bushee ,
